ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Course introduces the basics of linear optics, with discussion of applications currently being implemented in research. I would highly recommend it, as it provides a baseline of optics to build a greater understanding.
He is very kind and patient for assisting us, either in the tour lab or homework evaluation.
APHY 675 is a very useful course to expand and deepen your optics knowledge. The focus on applications is particularly useful, and as a result I would recommend this course to a friend.
This is a very good course. But it would be nice if the course can spent a little more time on some of the basics for non-physics background student.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Provides a fundamental baseline to build up in the proceeding years as my research matures. This 'baseline' may not be directly helpful, but important nevertheless as its the fundamentals that are the most daunting to learn when its coupled to the advanced theory presented in research papers.
It offers comprehensive analysis on some concepts in optics, which rectifies my previous wrong ideas. It provides me with some useful references for my research.
My research involves optic diagnostics and this course is useful to learn the fundamentals.
